author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY AS IT CONTINUES WESTWARD TOWARD HAWAII... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...HONE STRENGTHENS SLIGHTLY AS IT CONTINUES WESTWARD TOWARD HAWAII... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FOR THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 2:00 AM HST Sat Aug 24
 the center of Hone was located near 17.5, -151.3
 with movement W at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 998 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 65 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
